imageRequirements:
## Required Images
- Logo image suitable for header placement with transparent background, optimized for both light and dark backgrounds (logo.dim_200x80.png)

existing_features.title: Change the page background color to black across all pages and components
Update text colors throughout the application to use orange and white color scheme, with orange for headings/accents and white for body text
Integrate the user-provided logo into the page layout harmoniously without disrupting the existing layout or mobile responsiveness
Update Tailwind CSS configuration and global styles to support the new black background with orange and white color palette

new_feature_requests.summary: Change page layout to black background with orange and white text colors
Add logo to page harmoniously without affecting mobile responsiveness

projectName: Update page layout with black background, orange/white text, and harmonious logo integration
